definition:
The [*Cantor space*]{}, denoted by $\mathbb{C}$ is the set of all
infinite binary sequences with the product topology. It is a perfect
Polish space. It is a compact subspace of the Baire space, the set of
all infinite sequences of integers (again with the natural product
topology).

[**References.**]{}

-   Moschovakis, Yiannis N. *Descriptive Set Theory*. North-Holland Pub.
    Co. 1980, Amsterdam; New York.
